songs.title: Let Me Let You Know
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dear baby, I am not sorry for leaving you this way
But I know I should have told you face-to-face
We've always been straight up so I, I won't waste your time
I am leaving, say good-bye, because I know what you did last night

[Chorus]
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know
I don't know where I'm going but I'm going far from here
Let me let you know yeah
That I'm leaving baby

[Verse 2]
One more thing before I go, I hope you feel alone
Because I am definitely tired of waiting for you to come home
(been waiting for you at home)
We have always been straight up, so I, I will just take what is mine
I am leaving, say good-bye, because you hurt me for the last time
Let me, let you know

[Chorus]
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know
I don't know where I'm going but I'm going far from here
Let me let you know yeah
That I'm leaving baby

[Bridge]
Whatever your excuse is, I am sure, I have heard them all before
Time and time again I told you, that I need you more
Now I am walking out the door

[Chorus]
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know
I don't know where I'm going but I'm going far from here
Let me let you know yeah
That I'm leaving baby

[Interlude]
Ooh baby, I'm just here to let you know honey
Ooh, yeah
Here to let you know
Let me let you know yeah
I'm leaving

[Chorus]
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know, yeah
That I'm leaving baby
Let me let you know
I don't know where I'm going but I'm going far from here
Let me let you know yeah
That I'm leaving baby
